title: Any way to get 15 RP for free?
body: Hi there, I am 15 RP short of a champion I would like to buy and I was wondering if anyone here knew if there is any sort of a quick or easy way to get the remaining 15 RP. Thanks!

replies.body:
I got some hungry poros over here that tend to pay in small amounts of RP, but they only want to eat drawings right now for some reason ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Shoot me your best drawing of the champ you're wanting to buy and we'll see if they take the bait!
